name: Z Bird
description:
You control a bird. Jump on top of the cubes and repaint them. Avoid red enemies, the rest can be caught. The z-ball allows you to become invulnerable for a short time and destroy everything in your path. You will have to finish 12 levels and a boss at the end. The reward for the level depends on the number of jumps made: the less - the better. Game mechanics develops the ideas of the classic arcade game Q*bert (1982).
Full version with achievements and leaderboard available on Yandex.Games.
